Articles.Content:
I meant to share this before, but I forgor. So here it is! The High School I go to has "drawing tablets", as in we use IPads with the procreate app on them This project took about a week to do, since I could only do it when I finished what we had to do in art. But the final result looks amazing! Also my friend signed it. I still don't know why I had him sign it though. I had a reason...

Edited August 7, 2022 by Kerbalsaurus
Friend Shoutout!
